title: Roop Thong
overview: Following the death of his father, Moo reconnects with his estranged mother, grandmother, aunt and brother.  While his brother, Suea, welcomes him home, his mother makes it clear he is unwanted in her home.  Suea, in addition to building a relationship with his brother, finds himself stuck in a love triangle between his best friend Lahb and girlfriend Khao.
